Sentencas: Two oxides, Er2O3 and Nb2O3, are used to stabilize delta-phase Bi2O3 used as electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Phase stability and electric conductivity of Er2O3-Nb2O5 co-doped Bi2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: Optimization of dopant ratio and total doping concentration (TDC) is determined by X-ray diffraction, and successfully reduce the TDC (Er + Nb) to 10-15 mol.%.
Titulo: Phase stability and electric conductivity of Er2O3-Nb2O5 co-doped Bi2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: Conductivities of different compositions are measured by two-probe method.
Titulo: Phase stability and electric conductivity of Er2O3-Nb2O5 co-doped Bi2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: The results show that highest conductivity appears at the minimum doping concentrations.
Titulo: Phase stability and electric conductivity of Er2O3-Nb2O5 co-doped Bi2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: Phase stability of ENSB samples with Er/Nb ratio of 2/1 and TDC of 10-20 mol.% at 650 degrees C up to 300 h is analyzed showing two newly formed (alpha- and gamma-) phases in the samples.
Titulo: Phase stability and electric conductivity of Er2O3-Nb2O5 co-doped Bi2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: Degradation of conductivity at 650 C is studied in detail by DTA and TEM.
Titulo: Phase stability and electric conductivity of Er2O3-Nb2O5 co-doped Bi2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: The abnormity of lattice contraction of delta-phase is discussed.
Titulo: Phase stability and electric conductivity of Er2O3-Nb2O5 co-doped Bi2O3 electrolyte
